Name: Gulmira
description: Gulmira is 43 years old, married, and the mother of five children. Her husband and children help her with her work. Gulmira has a secondary education. She rears animals and grows crops together with her husband, having started many years ago. Thanks to her hard work, today Gulmira has three cows and seven sheep. She grows melons, carrots, peppers, cotton, clover and other organic vegetables for sale on a plot of 0.9 hectares of her own and 13.3 hectares of rented land. Her monthly profit is around 19,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Gulmira has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy cucumber seeds and develop her land and grow organic produce, and Gulmira will direct part of the funds to buy some livestock. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further developing her business, and also wants to fulfill her long-standing dream of opening a sewing workshop.
